Principles of Marketing

This module is design to provide in-depth knowledge about the concepts of Marketing and Marketing mix. This subject deals with the learning and understanding of the principles of marketing in hospitality and tourism areas. Students will be taught on the deeper part of market targeting and marketing planning. The methodology involved bringing in real-life scenario as a part of the discussion and mini cases are included as exercises to assess and strengthen students’analytical abilities.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Explain core principles of marketing and marketing mix.

+  Analyse the marketing macro environment.

+  Analyse the marketing micro environment.

+  Explain market segmentation and its relation to positioning.

+  Identify potential of segments based on market data and trends.

+  Perform marketing mix analysis.
